patthana13.1:6.1: Kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana13.1:6.3: Kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana13.1:6.4: kusalaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ … pe …
patthana13.1:6.6: kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naabyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana13.1:6.7: kusalaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā … pe …
patthana13.1:6.9: kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naakusalo ca naabyākato ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—
patthana13.1:6.10: kusalaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā … pe …
patthana13.1:6.12: kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo ca naakusalo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—
patthana13.1:7.1: Akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana13.1:7.3: Akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana13.1:7.4: akusalaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ … pe …
patthana13.1:7.6: akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naabyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana13.1:7.7: Akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo ca naabyākato ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana13.1:7.8: Akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo ca naakusalo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. #5
patthana13.1:8.1: Abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana13.1:8.2: vipākābyākataṃ kiriyābyākataṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ … pe …
patthana13.1:8.6: ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ paṭicca tayo mahābhūtā … pe …
patthana13.1:8.8: dve mahābhūte paṭicca dve mahābhūtā, mahābhūte paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ.
patthana13.1:8.9: Abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana13.1:8.16: abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo ca naakusalo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—
patthana13.1:9.1: Kusalañca abyākatañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana13.1:9.2: kusale khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ.
patthana13.1:9.3: Kusalañca abyākatañca dhammaṃ paṭicca naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana13.1:9.4: Kusalañca abyākatañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo ca naakusalo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. #3
patthana13.1:10.1: Akusalañca abyākatañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana13.1:10.2: Akusalañca abyākatañca dhammaṃ paṭicca naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana13.1:10.3: Akusalañca abyākatañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo ca naakusalo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana13.1:12.1: Kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naakusalo dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā.
patthana13.1:12.2: Kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naabyākato dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā.
patthana13.1:12.3: Kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naakusalo ca naabyākato ca dhammā uppajjanti ārammaṇapaccayā. #3
patthana13.1:13.1: Akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā.
patthana13.1:13.2: Akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naabyākato dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā.
patthana13.1:13.3: Akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo ca naabyākato ca dhammā uppajjanti ārammaṇapaccayā. #3
patthana13.1:14.1: Abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā.
patthana13.1:14.2: Abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naakusalo dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā.
patthana13.1:14.3: Abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo ca naakusalo ca dhammā uppajjanti ārammaṇapaccayā.
patthana13.1:15.1: Hetuyā ekūnavīsa, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā ekūnavīsa, anantare nava, samanantare nava, sahajāte ekūnavīsa … pe … vipāke tīṇi … pe … avigate ekūnavīsa.
patthana13.1:18.1: Akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā.
patthana13.1:18.2: Akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naabyākato dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā.
patthana13.1:18.3: Akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo ca naabyākato ca dhammā uppajjanti nahetupaccayā. #3
patthana13.1:19.1: Abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā.
patthana13.1:19.2: Abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naakusalo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā.
patthana13.1:19.3: Abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo ca naakusalo ca dhammā uppajjanti nahetupaccayā. #3
patthana13.1:20.1: Kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā.
patthana13.1:20.2: Kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naakusalo dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā.
patthana13.1:20.3: Kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo ca naakusalo ca dhammā uppajjanti naārammaṇapaccayā. #3
patthana13.1:21.1: Akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naakusalo dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā.
patthana13.1:21.2: Akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā.
patthana13.1:21.3: Akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo ca naakusalo ca dhammā uppajjanti naārammaṇapaccayā.
patthana13.1:22.1: Nahetuyā cha, naārammaṇe pannarasa, naadhipatiyā ekūnavīsa … pe … nakamme nava … pe … naāhāre … pe … namagge tīṇi … pe … novigate pannarasa.
patthana13.1:23.1: (Paccanīyaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ. Sahajātavārampi paccayavārampi vitthāretabbaṃ. Paccayavārepi hetuyā chabbīsa, ārammaṇe aṭṭhārasa … pe … avigate chabbīsa. Nissayavārampi saṃsaṭṭhavārampi sampayuttavārampi paṭiccavārasadisaṃ.)
patthana13.1:26.1: Kusalo dhammo nakusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana13.1:26.2: Kusalo dhammo naakusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana13.1:26.3: Kusalo dhammo naabyākatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana13.1:26.4: Kusalo dhammo naakusalassa ca naabyākatassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana13.1:26.5: Kusalo dhammo nakusalassa ca naakusalassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. #5
patthana13.1:27.1: Akusalo dhammo naakusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana13.1:27.2: Akusalo dhammo nakusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana13.1:27.3: Akusalo dhammo naabyākatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana13.1:27.4: Akusalo dhammo nakusalassa ca naabyākatassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana13.1:27.5: Akusalo dhammo nakusalassa ca naakusalassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. #5
patthana13.1:28.1: Abyākato dhammo nakusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana13.1:28.2: Abyākato dhammo naakusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana13.1:28.3: Abyākato dhammo nakusalassa ca naakusalassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana13.1:29.1: Kusalo dhammo nakusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo ….
patthana13.1:30.1: Akusalo dhammo naakusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo ….
patthana13.1:31.1: Abyākato dhammo naabyākatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo ….
patthana13.1:32.1: Hetuyā terasa, ārammaṇe aṭṭhārasa, adhipatiyā sattarasa, anantare soḷasa, samanantare soḷasa, sahajāte ekūnavīsa, aññamaññe nava, nissaye chabbīsa, upanissaye aṭṭhārasa, purejāte cha, pacchājāte nava, āsevane nava, kamme terasa, vipāke tīṇi, āhāre terasa … pe … magge terasa, sampayutte nava, vippayutte dvādasa … pe … avigate chabbīsa.
